abstract: A report by Dr. Charles A. Leale, who attended Abraham Lincoln after he was shot, is a highlight of the National Archives’ commemoration of the 150th anniversary of Lincoln’s assassination.

headline.main: Commemoration of Death of Lincoln Features Report From a Doctor in the House

snippet: A report by Dr. Charles A. Leale, who attended Abraham Lincoln after he was shot, is a highlight of the National Archives’ commemoration of the 150th anniversary of Lincoln’s assassination.
